backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing implemented UI changes and the files involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files.
frontend/.env: Development environment file setting VITE_SITE_NAME to vows-site.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment file setting VITE_SITE_NAME to vows-site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light and dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with site metadata, fonts, and React root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering NavBar, Home, About, Contact sections, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simplified footer showing branding and a single Instagram link.
frontend/src/components/LightboxModal.ts: Lightbox modal displaying an enlarged image with title and category.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with Home, About Us, and Get in Touch actions.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About page section featuring background text, highlights grid, and specialties list.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact form with validation, submission handling, and a success state using a custom inquiry form hook.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Displays a hero section with background image, headline, and buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Package: Shows package details in an accordion layout, pulling data from packagesData and displaying coverage, deliverables, and add‑ons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Provides a filterable image gallery with category selection and lightbox modal for viewing enlarged images.
frontend/src/components/sections/Pricing: Lists pricing tiers in card layouts with features and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/content/packages.ts: Defines package data including pricing, coverage, deliverables, add‑ons, turnaround times, and terms.
frontend/src/content/portfolio.ts: Exports categorized portfolio items with image paths, titles, and categories.
frontend/src/content/pricing.ts: Provides pricing tier definitions with descriptions, inclusions, and featured tier flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryForm.ts: Manages inquiry form state, validation, submission simulation via sessionStorage, and exposes handlers for input and reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identity, login/clear actions, and status tracking for authentication.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, typography, and dark mode theme for the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, container settings, utilities, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Stores project configuration, architectural notes, feature list, and state metadata for the photography website.
